label: A2B5C_oP32_58_eg_3gh_g-001
title: Andalusite (Al$_{2}$SiO$_{5}$, $S0_{2}$) Structure
comments:
Three crystal polymorphs of Al$_{2}$SiO$_{5}$ have been characterized, all with Al octahedra and chains of edge-sharing SiO$_{6}$ tetrahedra: \begin{itemize} \item \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B5C_aP32_2_4i_10i_2i-001}{kyanite ($S0_{1}$), space group $P\overline{1}$ \#2}, \item \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B5C_oP32_58_eg_3gh_g-001}{andalusite ($S0_{2}$), space group $Pnnm$ \#58} (this structure), and \item \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B5C_oP32_62_ac_3cd_c-001}{sillimanite ($S0_{3}$), space group $Pnma$ \#62}. \end{itemize} ~ \vspace{-.25in} 
 (Hermann, 1937) listed this as $S0_{2}$, but also gave it the $H5_{3}$ designation in the index.
